titleStmt.title: Here be the gathered counsailes of saynct Isodorie to informe man, howe he shuld flee vices and folowe vertues
titleStmt.author: Isidore, of Seville, Saint, d. 636.
Lupset, Thomas, 1495?-1530, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A translation, attributed to Thomas Lupset (cf. Halkett & Laing), from the original of Saint Isidore of Seville.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
